metadata.description: Log Analytics workspace is used to receive performance data. If this workspace is outside of the scope of the assignment you must manually grant 'Log Analytics Contributor' permissions (or similar) to the policy assignment's principal ID.
Don't run the deployment if the agent already have an existing connection to a Log Analytics Workspace or to SCOM

metadata.displayName: Optional: List of virtual machine images that have supported Windows OS to add to scope

metadata.description: Enable or disable the execution of the policy
Name of the tag to use for excluding VMs from the scope of this policy. This should be used along with the Exclusion Tag Value parameter.
Value of the tag to use for excluding VMs from the scope of this policy (in case of multiple values, use a comma-separated list). This should be used along with the Exclusion Tag Name parameter.
